description: Pseudo item for the orrery.
This is a pseudo item to represent a surface large enough to butcher a medium animal on.

name: scribes bureau
description: A wooden desk with drawers that can be used for symbolic scribing. It has implementations for gazing into the universe, tailored specifically to it's design.

name: ATM
description: For your banking convenience, this Automated Teller Machine is fully capable of operating autonomously in the event of complete network failure.  You can deposit funds from cash cards and migrate all of your inflation-adjusted earnings to a single card.  This thing has seen better days; there's been a run on the bank, and this machine has the dents and cracks to prove it.

name: Zen Garden

effect.u_message: Your time in meditation leaves you feeling enlightened.

false_effect.u_message: Your racing mind is unable to glean anything from your time spent meditating.

description: A place set aside for tranquility's sake.
Pseudo item for the magic circle.

name: self-made mirror
description: A full-length mirror painstakingly hand-mounted in a sleek metal frame.  You can easily see all of the dirt and blood on your clothes, and the weariness in your eyes.
Pseudo item for the magic circle.

name: soul engine
description: An engine that has been brought to a semblance of life by speaking with it for hours on end, slowly hypnotizing it to awareness of newfound eyes. It sputters as if gasping for air, heat and eldritch wisdom alike pouring from it's freshly opened spirit, a tempered vision of pure power.
Pseudo item for the magic circle.

name: White Circle
description: This is a neutral magic circle, carved into the ground and decorated with blood, money, low-burning candles, or white ink. It has been ritually enchanted to allow translocation.
Pseudo item for the magic circle.

name: Black Circle
description: This is a rough magic circle, carved into the ground and decorated with black ink.
Pseudo item for the magic circle.

name: Red Circle
description: This is a rough magic circle, carved into the ground and decorated with red ink.
Pseudo item for the magic circle.

name: Green Circle
description: This is a rough magic circle, carved into the ground and decorated with green ink.
Pseudo item for the magic circle.

name: Blue Circle
description: This is a rough magic circle, carved into the ground and decorated with blue ink.
Pseudo item for the magic circle.

name: knowing post
description: A crystal ball stuck onto a post so as to elevate it, giving it a clear view of the surroundings.

name: safe
description: A small, heavy, and near-unbreachable metal box with a rotary combination lock.  With something to listen really closely and a hell of a lot of time, you might be able to crack it.
Pseudo item for the altar of power.

name: stone altar

and.u_query: The crying skull begins wailing and shedding tears, and your cleansed soul feels heavy. Do you trade it at this dark altar for financial gain? You may incur the wrath of forces beyond your control.

effect.u_message: The crying soul inhales the cleansed soul, and a mysterious package is delivered to you.'

false_effect.u_message: The crying skull seems as though it's eagerly awaiting some sweet treat to calm it down. Something simple and clean.'

description: This is a devilish stone altar.  Most commonly used in morally questionable rituals. That's made more obvious by the human skull crying blood.
Pseudo item for the altar of power.

name: magic altar
description: An altar imprinted with a magic circle that makes almost all things much easier. It's laced with magic in it's entire construction, making it a necessary component in some high tier magical recipes.

and.u_query: Staring into the spirals of the magic circle you feel a great weight upon your soul. Something is trapped here, or perhaps there. The circle aches to free your soul from the stone prison you command. Do you allow it?

effect.u_message: The spiral stone becomes one with the circle, a putrid soul left behind like a deathbed tear.'

false_effect.u_message: The spirals of the magic circle imprinted in this altar seem to petrify at your gaze. Moments ago you know they moved freely, and now at your gaze they're but stone.

description: Pseudo item for the altar of power.

name: essential altar
description: An altar of pure worship without any fluff or unnecessary additions. It is the highest form of worship that any mortal will ever reach.
Pseudo item for the altar of power.

The core of an influential press that's been ripped straight out. Now that you're looking at it, you can tell it's just made of brimstone and crystallized mana, mixed so perfectly they're nearly indistinguishable. It radiates with magical energy, only some of it pure.

name: influential press
description: A dastardly machine containing an element capable of turning regular paper into liquid magic. It is simply above the level of anything else, capable of circumventing requirements that bind the world and keep it in check.

name: stone throne
description: An upright carving of jagged stone in the rough shape of a chair, scarred at the foot with a mural of four grovelling husks.

and.u_query: Do you bare naked your blazing heart in the face of damnation, drawing the ire of it's rightful owner?

false_effect.u_message: You read the inscription on the throne: 'Here rests the Prince of Dark Hearts, the four Kings who lay at his feet having cast for him a Throne.'

name: Total Incineration
description: Whatever power was once contained in the throne has been drained by the Dark Lord.
Dummy item.  If you see this, then something went wrong.
//: Include ZERO_WEIGHT flag to avoid errors when instantiating pseudo items.

name: silvermoon loom
description: A lunar spinwheel for spinning plant fibers into cordage, infused with the light of the silver moon. Each night that the moon turns it's eternal wheel you can weave moonlight into pure silver.

false_effect.u_message: Moonlight can only be woven into silver once a night by any one person.

name: goldensun_spring
description: A scalding hot wellspring of water drawn from deep within the earth by the life of golden reeds, each stalk hissing as water slowly seeps through them. Every day that the sun shines you can quench the daylight in it's twinkling waters, solidifying it into pure gold.

false_effect.u_message: Daylight can only be solidified into gold once a day by any one person.

description: Dummy item.  If you see this, then something went wrong.
//: Include ZERO_WEIGHT flag to avoid errors when instantiating pseudo items.

name: unholy brazier
description: A metal dish on a dark platform that breathes primordial energy, a tale of doom voiced by it effortlessly.

and.u_query: Do you smelt the four unholy contracts' seals in this accursed altar, branding your heart with their destruction?

effect.u_message: The essences of the four Kings melt into your soul as you obtain the power this brazier once foretold. True mastery of Reality is all that lay beyond.

false_effect.u_message: This is a place of power, though you know not of what kind. Etched in blood on the rim of the brazier is a saga of four Kings destined for destruction, their contracts signed and sealed.'

name: reinforced black concrete wall
description: A thick wall of concrete that was simply poured over a rebar cage. Effective, but indecent in appearance.

name: Total Incineration
description: Whatever power was once contained in the brazier has been reforged into your burning heart.

name: Collection Box Empty
description: The collection box is empty
Dummy item.  If you see this, then something went wrong.
//: Include ZERO_WEIGHT flag to avoid errors when instantiating pseudo items.

name: mailbox
description: A small metal box on top of a wooden post, designed to receive mail deliveries. If you registered this address, you might be able to get different deliveries. Although considering the circumstances, it will likely never see proper use again.

descriptions: Translocate to a nearby post office.
Translocate to a gate of your choosing.

description: Dummy item.  If you see this, then something went wrong.
//: Include ZERO_WEIGHT flag to avoid errors when instantiating pseudo items.

name: mailbox with registered address
description: A small metal box on top of a wooden post, designed to receive mail deliveries. This address has been registered as your own, meaning you'll be able to receive different kinds of deliveries.

name: portcrystal
description: A marker to be placed anywhere one might wish to return.

A frame formed of pure crystallized mana, foldable for easy storage.  Other vehicle components can be mounted on it, but it's lack of durability is legendary. Historically, mages have used it to quickly form bridges, even if each step is a leap of faith.

name: Long Movie
description: A long, engrossing movie.

name: Long Movie
description: A long, engrossing movie.

name: One More Episode
description: A long, engrossing episode.
Pseudo item for the altar of power.

name: Home Entertainment Center
description: A setup with everything somebody might need to kick back and watch a good flick. There's no power, so what could go wrong?

effect.u_message: Before you even realize it, you've spent an hour engrossed in 'Die Another Day.' There's just something so dreamy and familiar about that main character...

name: orichalcum cauldron
description: This is an alchemical cauldron made of orichalcum. The metal is especially resistant to the unique types of corrosion caused by alchemy. Could be simply deconstructed to move it around.

name: collection box
description: A small wooden box adorned with a holy symbol that you could place money inside, if you were feeling generous. Just examine it to look inside.

descriptions: Donate a strap of hundred dollar bills.
Donate a bundle of hundred dollar bills.
Donate a parcel of hundred dollar bills.
Reach in and steal a little money.
Leave without donating. Don't worry, it's understood that we all go through tough times.
